column17: Full Expensing Machinery and Buildings plus avg VAT base
Full Expensing Machinery and Buildings plus avg VAT base plus avg threshold
Transfer Tax eliminated (SDLT) - super-deduction remains in place
Transfer Tax eliminated (SDLT) + Full Expensing Machinery
Transfer Tax eliminated (SDLT) + Full Expensing Machinery + lower property tax as share of capital stock (1.7 -> 1.564)
Only lowering top PIT rate to .4
Mini-budget AS ANNOUNCED: top rate from .47->.42; cap gains rate from .3935 to .325; threshold from 3.4->1.14; machinery back to pre-super-deduction level: 0.758823529411765
Mini-budget Plus: expensing for machinery and buildings, land value tax for business rates, lower property tax as share of capital stock (1.7-1.564)
Mini-budget Plus Plus: expensing for machinery and buildings, land value tax for business rates, lower property tax as share of capital stock (1.7-1.564), lower VAT threshold to OECD avg

Mini-budget AS AMENDED: 

- corporation tax to 25%, machinery to pre-superdeduction level
- individual tax, as in the original but with dividend tax rate at 38.1% (not 39.35%)

Best in the G7: 
- corporation tax stays at 25% but also: expensing for machinery and buildings, land value tax for business rates, lower property tax as share of capital stock (1.7-1.564), lower VAT threshold to OECD avg. Top rate from .47->.42; dividend rate from .3935 to .325; threshold from 3.4->1.14? (i.e. the abolition of the top rate of income tax.)
